elements.title: Cambridge Carbon Map
elements.description: The Cambridge Carbon Map will bring together town and University organisations to create a public map of carbon emissions for the city of Cambridge. It will be accessible to anyone with a mobile phone and will allow you to compare carbon emissions for organisations with a simple tap on your mobile screen.

elements.title: Electricity generation charts by Ofgem
elements.description: Ofgem data portal for the energy markets in Great Britain. This portal gives direct access to all of our interactive data charts in a single location, alongside indicators we consider key to our performance monitoring.

elements.title: National Statistics Energy Trends: UK electricity
elements.description: Data on electricity generation, supply, consumption and fuel use for generation.

elements.title: Nord Pool
elements.description: Nord Pool runs the leading power market in Europe, and we offer day-ahead and intraday markets to our customers. The day-ahead market is the main arena for trading power, and the intraday market supplements the day-ahead market and helps secure balance between supply and demand. Historical datasets are available on their website.

elements.title: Electric Insights
elements.description: Electric Insights was established by Drax Group to help inform and enlighten the debate on Britainâ€™s electricity.

elements.title: EIA
elements.description: EIA the US Energy Information Administration has done a comprehensive survey of commercial buildings with their energy consumption

elements.title: ENERGYDATA.INFO
elements.description: ENERGYDATA.INFO is an open data platform providing access to datasets and data analytics that are relevant to the energy sector.

elements.title: Elexon
elements.description: Elexon meters data harvesting and comparison, balancing and settlement code (BSC), **lots and lots of data!** They also have an API, check this out [link](https://www.elexon.co.uk/new-balancing-mechanism-reporting-service-bmrs/)

elements.title: Balancing Mechanism Reporting Service
elements.description: primary channel for providing operational data relating to the GB Electricity Balancing and Settlement arrangements. It is used extensively by market participants to help make trading decisions and understanding market dynamics and acts as a prompt reporting platform as well as a means of accessing historic data

elements.title: Datasets for the US
elements.description: Data sets for the US (commercial and residential hourly load profile linked here - [link](https://catalog.data.gov/dataset/commercial-and-residential-hourly-load-profiles-for-all-tmy3-locations-in-the-united-state))

elements.title: link
elements.description: energy consumption UK data set link

elements.title: 5.5k households smart meter
elements.description: 5.5k households smart meter half hour readings between nov 11 and feb 14

elements.title: UK-DALE
elements.description: UK-DALE domestic appliance-level electricity demand and whole-house demand from five UK homes. [paper](https://www.nature.com/articles/sdata20157)

elements.title: REDD
elements.description: REDD : The Reference Energy Disaggregation Data Set at MIT. Paper: A public data set for energy disaggregation research. In proceedings of the SustKDD workshop on Data Mining Applications in Sustainability, 2011. [PDF](http://redd.csail.mit.edu/kolter-kddsust11.pdf)

elements.title: DRED
elements.description: DRED  (Dutch Residential Energy Dataset) is the first open-access, publicly available dataset from The Netherlands. The data set live deployment consists of several sensors measuring electricity, occupants occupancy and ambient parameters in a household.

elements.title: Solar Panel Energy Generation
elements.description: Solar Panel Energy Generation dataset contains voltage, current, power, energy, and weather data from low-voltage substations and domestic premises with high uptake of solar photovoltaic (PV) embedded generation.

elements.title: datasets
elements.description: Open datasets  & methodologies for carbon emissions from different activities. Forked from [OpenAMEE](https://www.amee.com/company), and npm installable

elements.title: programmable web list of energy api
elements.description: List of API energy related

elements.title: Programmable web list
elements.description: Programmable web list on solar-related APIs

elements.title: How to get solar radiation data
elements.description: How to get solar radiation and climate data (precipitaton, temperature, wind, insolation...) anywhere in the world free from NASA database
